column1: This file will be used to upload data to the FCPathologyDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column2: For recording information about an individual plant.

column7: The experiment name to which the plant is a part of.
A unique ID for the plant in the format 08PN0023_001. MUST BE UNIQUE
A number or name given to the plant. Example: 002
Any additional comments about the plant.
The row ID that the plant was planted in. The Plot ID is a unique ID in the format 08PN0023. Leave blank if not applicable.
The seed ID for the seed that was planted. The Seed ID is a unique ID in the format 08PN0023_001x. This is the ID that is printed on seed packets. Leave blank if not applicable.
